organisation_name: Centre for Interactive Education (CIE Global Limited) (CIE)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Mission: 
 
“Our mission is to enable learners to explore their potentialities, capabilities and opportunities and to make them independent to serve the society and industry with their intellectual, personal and professional knowledge and skills.” 
 
 
Vision: 
 
CIE will meet the changing needs of the society and industry through creating Professionals, Innovators, Entrepreneurs and Leaders. We will be dedicating all our knowledge, skills and energy to reduce the gap between the learners, institutions, employers and industries and to generate new opportunities.
